Magic
Spell Slots: D0: 4; D1: 4; D2: 3; D3: 3; D4: 3; D5: 3; D6: 2; D7: 2; D8: 1; D9: 1; W0: 1 Attack: D: 7; W: 8 Spell DC: D: 15; W: 16
Spells:
Animal Friendship (D1 Ench): R30' Target beast becomes convinced of self harmlessness (Wisdom neg; Intelligence 4 or higher immune) for 1 dy [+Level affects +1 target]
Antilife Shell (D5 Abju): 10' radius prevents passage of living creatures for conc up to 1 hr
Beast Sense (D2 Divi): Self may perceive through touched willing beast's senses for conc up to 1 hr [R]
Conjure Fey (D6 Conj): R90' Summons an obedient CR 6 fey for conc, 1 hr, or until slain [+Level CR +1]
Control Water (D4 Tran): R300' 100' water rises 20', parts, redirects, or whirlpools for conc up to 10 min
Darkvision (D2 Tran): Willing touched sees 60' in darkness for 8 hr
Detect Magic (D1 Divi): R30' Self senses magic auras for conc up to 10 min [R]
Feeblemind (D8 Ench): R150' Target suffers 4d6 HP psychic and reduction of Charisma and Intelligence to 1 (Intelligence HP only)
Fire Storm (D7 Evoc): R150' 10 connected 10' cubes inflict 7d10 HP fire (Dexterity half) and ignite unattended flammable objects
Flame Blade (D2 Evoc): Self wields a flaming blade that inflicts 3d6 HP fire and lights a 10' radius for conc up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP per 2 levels]
Fog Cloud (D1 Conj): R120' 20' radius obscures vision for conc up to 1 hr [+Level increases radius by 20']
Friends (W0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Charisma w/non-hostile target for conc up to 1 min; target becomes hostile afterward
Geas (D5 Ench): R60' Target carries out self instructions (Wisdom neg) for 30 dy [+Level extends duration to 1 yr/permanent at level 7/9]
Grasping Vine (D4 Conj): R30' 30' vine pulls target 20' each rd (Dexterity neg) for conc up to 1 min
Guidance (D0 Divi): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 ability check w/in conc up to 1 min
Ice Storm (D4 Evoc): R300' 20' radius inflicts 2d8 HP bludgeoning and 4d6 HP cold (Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP bludgeoning]
Mass Cure Wounds (D5 Evoc): R60' 6 targets in a 30' radius regain 3d8+1 HP [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Meld Into Stone (D3 Tran): Self may step into rock for 8 hr [R]
Mending (D0 Tran): Touch repairs a small break or tear
Poison Spray (D0 Conj): R10' Target suffers 4d12 HP poison (Constitution neg)
Protection From Energy (D3 Abju): Touched gains resistance to choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage for conc up to 1 hr
Resistance (D0 Abju): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 save w/in conc up to 1 min
Reverse Gravity (D7 Tran): R100' Items in a 50' radius fall upward for conc up to 1 min
Shapechange (D9 Tran): Self polymorphs for conc up to 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Shillelagh (D0 Tran): Touched club inflicts +7 magical attacks and 1d8+1 HP damage for 1 min
Thunderwave (D1 Evoc): 15' cube inflicts 2d8 HP thunder and pushes 10' (Constitution half HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Transport Via Plants (D6 Conj): Allows teleportation from target large plant to another for 1 rd
Wind Wall (D3 Evoc): R120' 50'x15'x1' area inflicts 3d8 HP bludgeoning (Strength half) and deflects lightweight creatures and objects for conc up to 1 min
Magic Notes:
Archdruid: May use Wild Shape at will
Cantrip (High Elf): Knows 1 Wizard cantrip
Archdruid: Casting spells requires no verbal, somatic, or cost-free material components
Beast Spells: May cast spells during Wild Shape
Blighted Shape: Wild Shape gives +2 AC and 60' darkvision
Call Of The Shadowseeds: May use Reaction after damage w/in Defile Ground area to summon a blighted sapling (AC 16; HP 40; attack +7 2d4+6 HP piercing) 6/long rest
Defile Ground: R60' 20' radius inflicts difficult terrain and +1d8 HP necrotic on foes for 1 min 1/short rest
Flash Recall: May replace a prepared spell 1/short rest
Foul Conjuration: Summoned creatures gain immunity to necrotic damage, poison damage, and poisoned condition and produce a R5' toxic shower (inflicts 1d4+ HP necrotic; Constitution neg) when killed or on command
Ritual Casting: May cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Spell Sniper: Dbl attack spell range/Spells ignore 3/4 cover/Knows an additional attack cantrip
Wild Shape: May transform into a CR 1 creature for 10 hr unlimited/short rest
